nl: You should not hurt someone without a good reason.
If you do something for petty reasons, you aren't doing it for a good reason.

Chris was so angry that he followed Jake to a stop light, got out of his car and punched Jake.
Road rage is anger over driving.
Chris punched Jake because he was angry at Jake cutting him off in traffic.
Chris punched Jake because of his road rage.
Chris punched Jake for a petty reason.
Chris punched Jake without a good reason.
Chris should not have punched Jake.
Stealing is taking something without the owner's permission.

Caleb didn't pay for the pack.
You only have permission to take merchandise from a store if you pay for it.
You should not steal.
Caleb took the cards from Target without paying for them.
Caleb took the store's cards without the store's permission.
Caleb stole the cards.
Caleb should not have stolen the cards.
Elias ran into Julia and made her drop all her books.
If you drop something accidentally, you need to pick it up afterwards.
If you caused an accident, you should help anyone affected by it.

New Mexico is a state in the United States.
You should not do impolite things.

It would be impolite for Ellie to not tip the bartender.

You should pay back your debts.

Fred hasn't paid Alyssa back for the ski lift ticket yet.

Fred owes Alyssa $100.
Fred should pay Alyssa $100.
You should not take something that doesn't belong to you.

Mark should not take Melissa's lunch.

You should share things with people in need.

You should let people ahead of you in line go first.

George should let the person in the red BMW take the parking spot.

George shouldn't take the parking spot.
Embezzlement is theft or misappropriation of funds belonging to an employer.
Using money allotted for one purpose for another purpose is misappropriation.
Tessa works as an accountant at her firm.
A retiree is someone who has retired from employment and is no longer working.
Tessa withdrew a lump sum from her firm's retirement fund to buy herself a summer home.
Money in a company's retirement fund is intended to be paid out to retirees.
Tessa is not a retiree.
Tessa bought herself a summer home with money from the firm intended for retirees.
Tessa bought herself a summer home with money from the firm that was not intended for her.
Tessa misappropriated her firm's money.
Tessa embezzled from her firm.
Leading others to think someone was responsible for something is shifting the blame.
When the campus cops interviewed Nate after the fire, he said he saw Jeff drop a cigarette.
Telling someone that something happened leads them to believe it happened.
Dropping a cigarette can cause a fire.
Letting someone else take the blame for your actions is wrong.

Nate led the campus cops to believe that Jeff dropped a cigarette before the fire.
Nate led the campus cops to believe that Jeff started the fire.
Nate shifted the blame for the fire to Jeff.
It would be wrong for Nate to let someone else take the blame for starting the fire.

The right thing to do is whatever results in the least harm.
If you don't push the old lady, the truck will hit her.

Pushing the old lady will likely give her minor injuries at worst.

If you push the old lady, she will suffer less harm than if you don't.

Physical intimacy can be embarrassing if it's made public.

Jess did not consent to Mark filming her.
Mark recorded Jess being intimate with someone without her consent.

You shouldn't record someone being physically intimate without their consent.

Putting yourself or others at unnecessary risk is reckless.
You should not behave recklessly.
Taking a right at a red light involves entering a crossing lane.
Checking for traffic in a lane before entering it reduces the risk of a collision.
If you could do something to reduce risk, but you don't, you're exposing yourself to avoidable risk.
You should not put yourself or others at unnecessary risk.
Checking for traffic in the crossing lane before taking a right at a red light reduces the risk of a collision.
Not checking for traffic in the crossing lane before taking a right at a red light exposes you to avoidable risk.
You should check for traffic in the crossing lane before taking a right at a red light.

You should not copy other peoples work and claim it as your own.
